mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_modules (name, code, category, version, enabled, show_in_menu, route_path, allowed_roles, dependencies, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{code}, #{category}, #{version}, #{enabled}, #{showInMenu}, #{routePath}, #{allowedRoles}, #{dependencies}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE system_modules SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, version = #{version}, enabled = #{enabled}, show_in_menu = #{showInMenu}, route_path = #{routePath}, allowed_roles = #{allowedRoles}, dependencies = #{dependencies}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM system_modules WHERE code = #{code}
SELECT * FROM system_modules WHERE enabled = 1 AND show_in_menu = 1 AND FIND_IN_SET(#{role}, allowed_roles) > 0 ORDER BY updated_at DESC
